channel.title: Spawning items in CheezScape?
channel.description:
Once again I have searched far and wide for this answer; How the HELL do you spawm items in Cheezscape? I am now an admin as I figured out how (thanks to those who told me anyway) but ::pickup #### # doesen't work, and nor does any other command!
Help pl0x

item.title: Spawning items in CheezScape?
item.dc:creator: @chester_1001 chester 1001
item.description:
@chester_1001 wrote:

lol it should work wit all those cleva ppl up there /\

some serves hav different commands like that

::make
::pickup
::item
::get

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning items in CheezScape?
item.dc:creator: @KsMuffin KsMuffin
item.description:
@KsMuffin wrote:

um ok i will try my best on helping you.

find, in your client.java

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

under that you will see a bunch of usernames,it will look somewhat like this:
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("-usernamehere-"))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

etc…

so take whatever name is in there and replace it with your owner character and change playerRights to 3

1=mod 2=admin 3=owner (THERE CAN ONLY BE 3 OF THESE!)

hope that helps…in some way?

Read full topic

um serch for pickup in client . java and it will say playername = (x91) chgange it to yours

item.title: Spawning items in CheezScape?
item.dc:creator: @assmonkey assmonkey
item.description:
@assmonkey wrote:

Go to your client.java and create a custom command.

if (command.startsWith(“yourcommandname”))
{
addItem(ID,Amount);
}

Read full topic
